Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common

Class ClassMethods

java.lang.Object
nl.naturalis.common.ClassMethods
public class ClassMethods
extends Object
Methods for inspecting types.
Author:
Ayco Holleman

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static List<Method> geSetters​(Class<?> beanClass)  
    static String getArrayTypeName​(Object array)
    Returns a friendly description of the type of the specified array.
    static String getArrayTypeSimpleName​(Object array)
    Returns a friendly description of the type of the specified array.
    static String getClassName​(Object obj)
    Returns getArrayTypeName(Object) if the argument is an array, else obj.getClass().getName().
    static List<Method> getGetters​(Class<?> beanClass, boolean strict)
    Returns the "getter" methods of the specified bean class.

    Tests whether the 1st argument extends or implements the 2nd argument.
    static boolean isPrimitiveArray​(Object arg)
    Returns whether or not the argument is an array of primitives without using reflection.

  • Method Details

    • isA

      public static boolean isA​(Class<?> classToTest, Class<?> superOrInterface)
      Tests whether the 1st argument extends or implements the 2nd argument. In case you keep forgetting who should be the caller and who the callee with Class.isAssignableFrom method.
      Parameters:
      classToTest - The class to test
      superOrInterface - The class or interface to test the class against
      Returns:
      Whether the 1st argument extends or implements the 2nd argument

    • isPrimitiveArray

      public static boolean isPrimitiveArray​(Object arg)
      Returns whether or not the argument is an array of primitives without using reflection. Null-safe.
      Parameters:
      arg - The object to test
      Returns:
      Whether or not it is an array of primitives

    • getClassName

      public static String getClassName​(Object obj)
      Returns getArrayTypeName(Object) if the argument is an array, else obj.getClass().getName().
      Parameters:
      obj - The object whose class name to return
      Returns:
      The class name

    • getSimpleClassName

      public static String getSimpleClassName​(Object obj)
      Returns getArrayTypeSimpleName(Object) if the argument is an array, else obj.getClass().getSimpleName().
      Parameters:
      obj - The object whose class name to return
      Returns:
      The class name

    • getArrayTypeName

      public static String getArrayTypeName​(Object array)
      Returns a friendly description of the type of the specified array. For example getArrayTypeName(new String[0][0]) will return java.lang.String[][].
      Parameters:
      array - The array
      Returns:
      The simple name of the array type

    • getArrayTypeSimpleName

      public static String getArrayTypeSimpleName​(Object array)
      Returns a friendly description of the type of the specified array. For example getArrayTypeName(new String[0][0]) will return String[][].
      Parameters:
      array - The array
      Returns:
      The simple name of the array type

    • getGetters

      public static List<Method> getGetters​(Class<?> beanClass, boolean strict)
      Returns the "getter" methods of the specified bean class.
      Parameters:
      beanClass - The class from which to retrieve the getters.
      strict - Whether or not to include only methods with JavaBean compliant names ( isXyz() for boolean methods; getXyz() for other methods). If strict is false, all public methods that take no parameters are included in the returned List.
      Returns:

    • geSetters

      public static List<Method> geSetters​(Class<?> beanClass)

    • getPropertyNameFromGetter

      public static String getPropertyNameFromGetter​(Method m, boolean strict)

    • getPropertyNameFromSetter

      public static String getPropertyNameFromSetter​(Method m)
